Description: Base of East Greek (?) pottery cup with tall ring foot; orange clay with some silver mica; interior: black, reserved disc on floor with two circles and a dot; some form of light 'chattering' on glazed part of interior; exterior reserved; black on inside of foot; on underside, three circles and a dot; incised inscriptions on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 477)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.875)
